data.description: Continued development of the field of dance/movement therapy with specific emphasis on DMT with specific populations and research in the field.  Fieldwork in community programs is required.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO DYNAMICS OF DANCE THERAPY

data.description: Orientation to the scope of dance therapy as a profession. Historical framework, theoretical rationale, and present application of dance/movement therapy.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO DANCE/MOVEMENT THERAPY
